title: Scanco Software Acquires ACS Group Inc.’s Multi-Bin and Manufacturing Efficiency Suite
text:
Acquisition Solidifies Scanco's Position as the Leading Solutions Provider for Manufacturers and Distributors on the Sage 100 ERP Platform
SARASOTA, Fla.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Scanco Software, LLC., the leader in Warehouse Management and Manufacturing Automation Solutions, today announced the acquisition of Advanced Computer Solutions (ACS) Group, Inc., the developers of ACS Multi-Bin and Warehouse Management, and over 20 years of experience with Sage Accounting Software and hardware experience. ACS Group offers state of the industry expertise for the entire family of Sage 100 ERP products. The acquisition solidifies Scanco Software’s standing as the leading developer of mobile applications focused on the needs of manufacturers, distributors, and supply chain organizations utilizing the Sage 100 ERP Platform.
Scanco’s integrated solutions are unparalleled in the industry and the addition of the ACS Group Warehouse and Manufacturing Solutions gives our customer base that much more functionality under one roof. This acquisition along with this summer’s acquisition of Sage Manufacturing 100c/JobOps and the announcement of Sage Mobility for Barcode this fall, form a compelling choice for manufacturers, distributors and supply chain organizations aiming to compete more effectively and better serve their customers.
“As a long-time strategic partner of ACS Group, Scanco looks forward to driving continued, significant business through our Partners that support our delivery of innovative solutions and expert services,” says Shaun Boros, partner of Scanco. “Together, Scanco and ACS Group offer a powerful combination of warehouse management, manufacturing automation, and continued Sage solutions development that aligns with Scanco’s value proposition as a single source for our customers’ diverse supply chain needs.”
“Today starts an exciting era for the current customers and partners of both Scanco and ACS Group,” said ACS Group Partner Ron Jacobs. “For ACS Group customers, they can feel assured that they will have continuity, and that we will provide a smooth transition. Our customers and partners will benefit from our accelerated investment in products and solutions for the Sage 100 ERP Platform.”
Scanco aims to, not only advance Warehouse and Manufacturing Automation with the combined companies, but to also continue developing best practices that aid distributors and manufacturers in embracing the benefits of mobility solutions in the “Industry 4.0” movement. “When it comes to mobility implementations, customer success is often determined by how you implement, not just what you implement,” said Tess Boros, Partner at Scanco. “With our combined 40 plus years of experience, we are dedicated to making this transition easier for our customers. We welcome ACS Group’s customers into the Scanco fold.”
About Scanco
Since 1989, Scanco has been a leading provider of supply chain automation software and services. Since our inception, we have focused on innovative warehouse management solutions with a unique technology-driven approach. Our solutions deliver unequaled efficiency and visibility for distribution and manufacturing companies around the globe.
From basic barcoding to the most complex distribution and manufacturing operations - Scanco software is positioned to grow with our customers ever-changing business needs. We are focused on providing top-tier, fully integrated automation solutions built specifically for your ERP solution. Today, thousands of world-class distribution and manufacturing companies have automated their facilities with cutting-edge Scanco technology.
You can learn more about the Scanco/ACSG Announcement here.
About Advanced Computer Solutions (ACS) Group, Inc.
With over 20 years of experience with Sage Accounting Software and hardware experience, ACS Group offers state of the industry expertise for the entire family of Sage MAS Sage 100 ERP products. In addition, our Gold Development Partner status allows us to customize any Sage management software to meet the specific needs of each and every industry. Several of these customizations are available as ready-to-configure enhancements to the system; others are completed as needed based on a company’s specific requirements.
